name: Freakshow (gnomelackey)
description:
Come one! Come all! The Freakshow is in town!

We have creatures from all over the dying world. Creatures from beyond Bergen Chrypt. Even some from realms not our own. Gather close, listen up, because your in for a wild ride.

The Freakshow is a bestiary that will be updated monthly with new content. Each month will be a different theme, and will vary from 1 - 3 new monsters. Each addition will include: the monsters, their tokens, and some lore.
